name: Dagger
description: A small and sharp weapon used for close-quarters combat.
looks: The dagger has a double-edged blade with a sharp point. The handle has a grip for better control and is made of wood.

special_weapon_skils.dagger_proficiency: Grants a bonus to Dagger skill when used.

name: Iron Axe
description: A heavy iron axe with a sharp blade, capable of dealing significant slashing damage.
looks: The iron axe has a long wooden handle and a curved iron blade. The blade is sharp and has a few nicks and scratches from previous battles.

name: Iron Sword
description: A sturdy iron sword with a sharp blade.
looks: The iron sword has a straight blade with a single cutting edge. The hilt is made of wood and wrapped in leather for a comfortable grip.

name: Steel Plate Armor
description: A heavy armor made from steel plates
looks: The armor is made up of overlapping steel plates, covering the entire torso and extending down to the thighs. It also has shoulder and elbow guards.

name: Obsidian Sword
description: A sharp and sturdy sword made from obsidian, a volcanic glass known for its exceptional cutting edge.
looks: The obsidian sword has a sleek black blade with a razor-sharp edge. The hilt is wrapped in leather for a comfortable grip, and the pommel is adorned with a small obsidian gem.

special_weapon_skills.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when wielded.

name: Silver Longsword
description: A longsword made from silver, known for its ability to harm supernatural creatures.
looks: The silver longsword has a polished blade with a slight curve. The hilt is adorned with intricate engravings of symbols and runes.

special_effects.supernatural_damage: Deals additional damage to supernatural creatures.

name: Iron Sword
description: A sturdy sword made from iron
looks: The iron sword has a straight and double-edged blade with a crossguard for hand protection. The hilt is wrapped in leather for a secure grip.

special_weapon_skils.swordsmanship: Increases damage and accuracy with swords.

name: Silver Sword
description: A sleek and deadly sword made from pure silver.
looks: The Silver Sword has a long, slender blade with a curved point. The hilt is made of polished silver, with an ornate design and a handle wrapped in black leather.

special_weapon_skills.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill.

special_effects.silver_enchantment: Deals extra damage to creatures vulnerable to silver.

name: Iron Shield
description: A sturdy iron shield that offers excellent protection against physical attacks.
looks: The iron shield is made of a solid iron plate, reinforced with rivets around the edges. It has a curved shape, designed to deflect incoming attacks.

name: Iron Sword
description: A sturdy iron sword with a sharp blade.
looks: The iron sword has a straight blade with a single edge and a sharp point. The hilt is wrapped in leather for a comfortable grip and has a simple crossguard.

name: Iron Greatsword
description: A large two-handed sword made of iron
looks: The Iron Greatsword has a long, broad blade with a slight curve and a double-edged design. The hilt is made of sturdy leather and has a crossguard for added protection.

special_weapon_skils.Swordsmanship: Increases damage dealt with swords by 10%

name: Fireball Scroll
description: A scroll containing a spell that allows the caster to unleash a powerful fireball at a target.
looks: The Fireball Scroll is made of aged parchment and is sealed with red wax. It has intricate runes and symbols inscribed along the edges.

special_effects.burn: Has a chance to set the target on fire, dealing additional damage over time.

name: Adamantine Sword
description: A powerful sword forged from adamantine, known for its incredible durability and sharpness.
looks: The Adamantine Sword has a gleaming silver blade that is razor-sharp. The hilt is made of a black, polished metal with intricate engravings of mythical creatures. The pommel is adorned with a large blue gemstone.

special_weapon_skills.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when wielded.

name: Iron Sword
description: A basic sword made of iron
looks: The iron sword has a straight, double-edged blade with a simple hilt made of iron. It is a sturdy and reliable weapon.

name: Magician's Staff
description: A powerful staff used by magicians to channel their spells.
looks: The magician's staff is made of polished wood and is adorned with intricate carvings and magical runes. It has a crystal orb at the top that glows with a soft, pulsating light.

special_weapon_skills.magic_strikes: Allows the user to perform powerful magical strikes.
